title: AKR Makes Bullish Cross Above Critical Moving Average - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Tuesday, shares of Acadia Realty Trust (Symbol: AKR) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $27.66, changing hands as high as $27.67 per share. Acadia Realty Trust shares are currently trading up about 1% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of AKR shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
